variants.Description in input context: This variant results in a change of amino acid Q to X at position 584, which is predicted to have an effect on the protein.

Material used.Description: The experiment was conducted using HeLa cells.

Readout description.Result Description: Protein expression was reduced by 30% for the variant NM_032864.3:c.1753C>T.

Technical replicates.Description: Each sample was run in triplicate.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type cDNA was used as a positive control.

Basic negative control.Description: Empty vector was used as a negative control.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: t-test was used for statistical analysis.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: Protein expression greater than 80% on day 7.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Protein expression less than 50% on day 7.
